mapper.sql: STATIC_DATA_GUID "staticDataGuid", TF_CLO_CODE "tfCloCode", TF_CLO_NAME "tfCloName", CREATE_USERID "createUserid", CREATE_TIME "createTime", TF_REMARK "tfRemark", STATIC_ID "staticId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TD_STATIC_DATA(STATIC_DATA_GUID, TF_CLO_CODE, TF_CLO_NAME, CREATE_USERID, CREATE_TIME, STATIC_ID) SELECT sys_guid(),d.TF_CLO_CODE, d.TF_CLO_NAME,#{newSInfo.createUserid}, #{newSInfo.modifyTime},#{newSInfo.staticId} FROM TD_STATIC_DATA d where d.static_id = #{sourceStaticId}
mapper.select: select cd.TF_CLO_NAME from td_static_info cn join td_static_data cd ON cn.STATIC_ID=cd.STATIC_ID where cn.TF_CLO = #{dictType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cd.TF_CLO_CODE = #{dictCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
